data.name: GET /concepts
data.definition: Search concepts by term and source terminology (SAB)

params.name: term
params.definition: Any source medical term, e.g. diabetes

params.name: sabs
params.definition: A comma separated list of source vocabularies to restrict the concepts

params.name: partial
params.definition: 1/0 (if partial=1 then term will be partial term matches will be returned. if partial =0 then all matches will be returned. default =0)

data.name: GET /concepts_bulk
data.definition: Search concepts by terms in bulk and source terminology (SAB)

params.name: terms
params.definition: A delimiter separate list of terms

params.name: sabs
params.definition: A comma separated list of source vocabularies to restrict the concepts

params.name: partial
params.definition: 1/0 (if partial=1 then term will be partial term matches will be returned. if partial =0 then all matches will be returned. default =0)

params.name: delimiter
params.definition: delimiter which separates the terms, default is comma(,)

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui
data.definition: Get full details for a concept (specified by CUI)

params.name: cui
params.definition: concept id

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui/children
data.definition: Get all childrens for a given concept. By default it will get all childrens based on UMLS (REL=CHD) or the relationships can be restricted a given vocabulary

params.name: cui
params.definition: concept id

params.name: sabs
params.definition: The source vocabs to restrict the child definition. Currently supported: MeSH and SNOMEDCT

params.name: explode
params.definition: 1/0 - if set to 1 then get all children recursively. Currently supported vocabularies: MeSH

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui/parents
data.definition: Get all parents for a given concept. By default it will get all parents based on UMLS (REL=PAR) or the relationships can be restricted a given vocabulary

params.name: cui
params.definition: concept id

params.name: sabs
params.definition: The source vocabs to restrict the parent definition

params.name: explode
params.definition: 1/0 - if set to 1 then get all parents recursively. Currently supported vocabularies: MeSH

data.name: GET /concepts_bulk/:cui,:cui,:cui/parents
data.definition: Get all parents for a given list of concepts. By default it will get all parents based on UMLS (REL=PAR,RB) or the relationships can be restricted a given vocabulary

params.name: cui list
params.definition: comma seperated list of concept ids

params.name: sabs
params.definition: The source vocabs to restrict the parent definition

params.name: explode
params.definition: 1/0 - if set to 1 then get all parents recursively. Currently supported vocabularies: MeSH

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui/synonyms
data.definition: Get all synonym strings for a given Concept (:cui). Optionally, restrict the synonyms to a list of vocabularies.

params.name: cui
params.definition: concept id

params.name: sab
params.definition: A List of source vocabularies

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui/relationships/:rel_type
data.definition: Get all relationships for a given concept

params.name: cui
params.definition: concept id

params.name: rel_type
params.definition: The relationship types, IR: The relationship necessary for information retrieval,KDD: The relationships necessary for knowledge discovery,HUB: Only the “hubs” concepts

params.name: degree
params.definition: Control the number of hops in the graph

params.name: code
params.definition: Search for a given code

params.name: sab
params.definition: Restrict the search a given set of vocabularies

params.name: code
params.definition: Get details about a code

params.name: sab
params.definition: In a given source vocabulary

data.name: GET /codes/:code1/sab/:sab1/mapping/:sab2
data.definition: Get semantically equivalent mappings for code1 in sab1 in sab2

params.name: code1
params.definition: Get details about a code

params.name: sab1
params.definition: In a given source vocabulary

params.name: sab2
params.definition: The target vocabulary to find a code in

data.name: GET /concepts/:cui/hiers
data.definition: Get all ancestor_trees for a given concept. It will get all ancestor_trees based on UMLS (MRREL). These can be restricted to a given vocabulary

params.name: cui
params.definition: Get details about a code

params.name: sab
params.definition: from a given source vocabulary
